description: A lightweight, 2.5-layer, waterproof biking jacket to throw on when the weather turns. Packable and breathable, it has a protective close-fitting, under helmet, stiff peak hood and venting zips that give access to jersey pockets.
name: Cinder Downpour Jacket - Womens

specs.value: 40D Pertex® Shield 2.5-Layer construction waterproof technology with fluorocarbon free DWR (120 g
